## Intro

This repository contains the R scripts used for analysing the Prolific data collected from October 13th 2023 to October 16th 2023. It is survey data regarding determinants of food waste, self-reported food waste and habitual behaviours.

## Contents

-   R folder contains all the R scripts

-   output contains output like plots

-   prelim_output.html is a file showing some preliminary analysis, with related quarto MD in the file of the same name.
